description:
KDE Plasma 6.1.5 is here about five weeks after KDE Plasma 6.1.4 and improves the speed and performance of Plasma Discover’s search feature, adds the ability to drag-and-drop stuff onto a Plasma panel on Wayland when it’s in auto-hide mode, and reintroduces support for moving the focus out of the Favorites grid view of the […]

The post KDE Plasma 6.1.5 Released with More Bug Fixes for Plasma 6.1 Users appeared first on Linux Today.
title: KDE Plasma 6.1.5 Released with More Bug Fixes for Plasma 6.1 Users
